text: Silba is an island in Croatia. It is found between the islands of Premuda and Olib. It has an area of 15 kmÂ² and its population (as of 2001) was 265; with the village of Silba located at the narrowest point in the middle. The main administrative centre is Zadar, found on the mainland. Category:Mediterranean Islands Category:Islands of Croatia
title: Silba
